properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Neeligaganaana velige thaarala boli lokaana velugudam Madhura swarampu pakshula boli Yesunake stuthi paadudam{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Puvvula parimalambu lella thotalo vyapinchu natlugaa Punikatoda lokamanedi thotalo parimalam nimpumu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Chandra sooryulu prakasamivva andakaaramu maayamou Needu jeevita tejambu velgan paapaandhakaaramu povunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
